_header: Your goodlihood mine hearts lady dear
_description: Charles d’Orléans, On his mistress — three 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) and 4-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
Yowre goodlihed myn hertis lady dereSo thrillith me in my
                    remembraunce…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…Then forto fonne in þe secunde daunceIf it like yow enioy
                    me in sum wise
